sourcesContent:
<template>
  <Wrapper id="app" paddingTop="0">
    <!-- <transition :name="transitionName"> -->
    <keep-alive :include="router" max="6">
      <router-view></router-view>
    </keep-alive>
    <!-- </transition> -->
    <AppDialog></AppDialog>
    <ShareGuide></ShareGuide>
    <AppActivity :isPush="true"></AppActivity>
    <AppActivity :isPush="false"></AppActivity>
    <AppLoading v-show="httpLoading" :type="'data'"></AppLoading>
    <AppNavgation ref="footer" v-show="nav" :active="activeNav"></AppNavgation>
  </Wrapper>
</template>

<script>
import message from './api/message/index'

import { mapState, mapActions } from 'vuex'

import Wrapper from './components/Wrapper'
import AppDialog from './components/AppDialog'
import ShareGuide from './components/ShareGuid'
import AppLoading from './components/AppLoading'
import AppActivity from './components/AppActivity'
import AppNavgation from './components/AppNavgation'

import httpService from './service/httpService'
import dialogService from './service/dialogService'

export default {
  name: 'app',
  data() {
    return {
      nav: true, // 是否显示导航
      guidType: null, // 注册引导类型
      activeNav: 'index' // 当前激活的导航
    }
  },
  async mounted() {
    this.nav = this.$route.meta.nav
  },
  updated() {
    if (this.nav) this.resetNav()
  },
  methods: {
    // 重制导航位置
    resetNav() {
      let scrolled =
        document.documentElement.scrollTop || document.body.scrollTop
      let windowHeight = document.documentElement.clientHeight
      let scrollHeight = document.documentElement.scrollHeight
      let scrollBottom = scrolled + windowHeight >= scrollHeight
      this.$refs.footer.$el.style.position = scrollBottom ? 'absolute' : 'fixed'
    }
  },
  computed: {
    ...mapState({
      router: state => state.system.router,
      httpLoading: state => state.system.httpLoading
    })
  },
  components: {
    Wrapper,
    AppDialog,
    ShareGuide,
    AppLoading,
    AppActivity,
    AppNavgation
  },
  watch: {
    $route(to, from) {
      this.nav = to.meta.nav
      this.activeNav = to.path.split('/')[1]
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped lang="scss">
</style>
